docTitle.titlePart: New Constituents of Essential Oil from Elsholtzia pilosa*

byline.docAuthor: H. J. Bestmann, U. Kobold, B. Claßen, and O. Vostrowsky

and
G. C. Sah, A. K. Pant, A. B. Melkani, and C. S. Mathela

front.div:
By means of GC and GCMS 31 constituents of the essential oil of Elsholtzia pilosa have been
identified, 1.8-cineol representing the main component (50%). The oil composition with respect
to its major constituents has been compared with other Elsholtzia species.
